__e: If I could deliver one message to the researchers who are looking for the cause of diabetes, and the cause of clogged arteries and the cause of high blood pressure and the cause of obesity,
The notes mentioned blood pressure and stress. He was prescribed sleeping pills.
Turns out if diabetics take it, it can cause hypertension or even death.
BP 74 over palp, multiple shrapnel wounds to abdomen.
Blood pressure, 180 over 110 and still climbing.
